page.title: 19Ulverston and Albert,France
page.content: The Ulverston-Albert{twinning started in September 1976 and is cel- ebrating its 10th anniversary this year. The twinning was developed by both Town Councils in order to promote better Anglo-French understanding which is now encouraged by annual football competitions,school and choir exchanges,and excursions to places of interest in each region. The people who have taken part have made new contacts and developed long-standing friendships and thus achieved a firmer understanding of each other. At first the exchange was of an educational nature,but now it has exp- anded and involves people from all walks of life. The twinning has made each town more keenly aware of the other's way of life and has developed a stronger bond between them.Ulverston hopes it will continue to thrive.
